extends R2LightReadableType

      • matchLightSingle

        <A,B,E extends Throwable> B matchLightSingle(A context,
                                             com.io7m.jfunctional.PartialBiFunctionType<A,R2LightVolumeSingleType,B,E> on_volume,
                                             com.io7m.jfunctional.PartialBiFunctionType<A,R2LightScreenSingleType,B,E> on_screen)
                                      throws E extends Throwable
        Match on the type of light.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of context values
        B - The type of returned values
        E - The type of raised exceptions
        Parameters:
        context - A context value
        on_volume - Evaluated for volume lights
        on_screen - Evaluated for screen lights
        Returns:
        A value of type B
        Throws:
        E - If any of the given functions raise E
        E extends Throwable
